title: Aaron Rodgers Is Back in Green Bay. But Will He Be Traded Next Season?
description:
Kevin and Nora react to the deal that will bring Aaron Rodgers to training camp in Green Bay. What concessions did the team make to convince him to come back? Plus: Will this situation ultimately result in Rodgers getting traded this season?

Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Additional Production: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
